data.title: Robert Lewandowski and İlkay Gündoğan were awarded in Germany
data.meta_description: Robert Lewandowski and İlkay Gündoğan were present this Monday in Germany in the gala of the newspaper Sportbild. They were leading stood out of a party in which ambo sfueron distinguished like legends of the Bundesliga
data.text:
This Monday carried out the gala of the German newspaper Sportbild like homage to the six decades of the championship. İlkay Gündogan And Robert Lewandowski received a bathroom of recognition by part of the football of the country Teutonic. The international midfield player German and the Pichichi Polish of the FC Barcelona were leading stood out of a party in which both received the award that distinguishes them like legends of the Bundesliga.

Sportbild Chose to Gündogan like the best German player of the year, after capitanear the past season to the Manchester City, that won it everything, before fichar by the Barça this same summer when finish agreement with the English club. "It is a privilege be distinguished beside legends like Wolfgang Overath, Karl-Heinz Rummenigge, Matthias Sammer, Felix Magath, Lothar Matthäus and Thomas Müller, and more still be the only foreigner of this cast. Play in the Bundesliga always will be a big part of my life. Thanks to all by the congratulations, went an unforgettable day!", it wrote Lewandowski in his social networks.

"In my conversation with Lewandowski before coming to Barcelona, his eyes shined when it spoke me of the club. It ensured me that it was the correct decision", desveló Gündogan, leading of his first big moment like culé when inventing the first goal of the Barça in front of the Cádiz beside Pedri. The midfield player little by little goes leaving his best version in the Catalan group and expects that with the step of the time was a new leader inside the changing room.

Gündogan And Lewandowski, all a together life

The midfield player and the forward had the opportunity to coincide in the best Borussia Dortmund of the century, and now have reencontrado in the Barça. During the five years of Gündoğan in Dortmund, three were with Lewandowski in the team. Both coincided a total of 74 times on the lawn, with a balance of 51 victories, 15 ties and 13 defeats, what supposes 64,60% of triumphs.
